title: North Korea blasts K-pop industry as 'slave-like exploitation' amid crackdown on foreign media
content:
1. North Korea blasts K-pop industry as 'slave-like exploitation' amid crackdown on foreign media  CNN

localize.title: 朝鲜抨击K-pop产业是 "奴隶式剥削"，打击外国媒体。
